data.text: @LalitKumarAgr11 As mentioned earlier, a passenger is denied only when it is beyond the control of the airline to accept once the counter/boarding gate is closed. Unfortunately, we would not able to process your request for changes/cancellation. 1/2
@LalitKumarAgr11 We try our best to accommodate as many passengers as we can but a passenger is denied only when it is beyond the control of the airline to accept once the counter/gate is closed. 2/2
@LalitKumarAgr11 Hi Lalit, as per our records, the passengers reported at the boarding gate after the gate closure, hence, we could not accept them for the flight.1/2

@rishabhc095 Hi Rishab, drones are only allowed in check-in baggage. The batteries must be removed and can be carried as hand baggage only. The battery terminals should be insulated to avoid any unintentional short circuit. The maximum watt hour of the battery must not exceed 160 WH.
